ALWAYS ACTIVE: Both Champion’s First Medium Attack grants an indefinite Spider-Seal Buff to the Opponent that has no effect. Max 20.
Bursts of Energy Damage, personal Passive effects and Buffs cannot have their Ability Accuracy modified.
Each Unique Buff on the Opponent reduces their Ability Power Rate by 33%. The Power denied is transferred to Spider-Man.
When Spider-Seal is nullified or expires, Mystic Dispersion does not grant Power; instead it deals a Burst of 3.91 Energy Damage for every 1% of Power not gained.
BLESSING OF THE ASTRAL FORM: When the Opponent gains a Spider-Seal, Unblockable or Unstoppable Buff, Spider-Man gains the Blessing of the Astral Form, causing incoming Attacks to Miss for 3 second(s). Spider-Man can Block while this Blessing is active, unless the Opponent has an Unblockable Buff. This effect cannot be refreshed.
Nullifying Spider-Seal Buffs also triggers this Blessing and intercepting the Opponent while this Blessing is active grants 3 Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.
If a Miss is triggered, this effect goes on Cooldown for 20 second(s), minus 3 per Unique Buff on the Opponent to a minimum of 10 second(s). Unblockable Buff attacks ignore this cooldown.
BLESSING OF THE SPIDER-TOTEM: When the Opponent gains a Buff, Spider-Man gains a Totem Charge. At 20 Totems, or half as much as a Defender, he activates the Blessing of the Spider Totem, lasting for 20 second(s) and granting the benefits listed below:
His own First Medium Attacks Nullify Spider-Seal Buffs instead of granting them, dealing a Burst of 18.05 Energy Damage if a Spider-Seal was nullified.
Gain 52.25 Attack Rating, Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70%, but gains 25% of Max Power every 9 second(s).
When the Opponent gains a Buff, they also gain a Spider-Seal Buff and pause this Blessing for 1 second(s). Pause also triggers when nullifying a Spider-Seal.
BLESSING OF THE WEB: Heavy Attack grants the Blessing of the Web for 15 second(s). When the Opponent gains Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, Regeneration or Pierce Buffs, Spider-Man gains the same Buff with its listed Potency and duration.
20% Potency Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, and Pierce, and Regeneration, granting 2.2% of Max health. All Buffs last 10 second(s).
As a Defender, gain this Blessing every 15 second(s) unless struck by a Heavy Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit grants 1 Spider-Seal Buff to the Opponent.
Blessing of the Web: Last hit inflicts the Curse of the Web, reducing the Potency of Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, Regeneration and Pierce Buffs by 95% for 20 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Last 3 hits deal 35.63 Energy Damage.
Blessing of the Spider Totem: Each hit Nullifies 1 Spider-Seal Buff and deals a burst of 46.55 Energy Damage per Buff nullified.
Both of these effects go through the Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Root Passive for 4 second(s). Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still Attack, Block and Dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, any contact Power Steals for 2% of the Opponent’s current Power, gains 100% of the Power stolen, and any contact grants Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.

As a Defender, gain this Blessing every 15 second(s) unless struck by a Heavy Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit grants 1 Spider-Seal Buff to the Opponent.
Blessing of the Web: Last hit inflicts the Curse of the Web, reducing the Potency of Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, Regeneration and Pierce Buffs by 95% for 20 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Last 3 hits deal 202.88 Energy Damage.
Blessing of the Spider Totem: Each hit Nullifies 1 Spider-Seal Buff and deals a burst of 265.09 Energy Damage per Buff nullified.
Both of these effects go through the Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Root Passive for 4 second(s). Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still Attack, Block and Dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, any contact Power Steals for 2% of the Opponent’s current Power, gains 100% of the Power stolen, and any contact grants Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.

sig_info: Blessing of the Astral Form: Gain 1 to 12% of Max Power when its cooldown triggers.
Blessing of the Spider Totem: Increases the Potency of Bursts of Energy Damage by 5 to 40%.
Blessing of the Web: Increase the Potency of granted Buffs by 5 to 40%.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Both Champion’s First Medium Attack grants an indefinite Spider-Seal Buff to the Opponent that has no effect. Max 20.
Bursts of Energy Damage, personal Passive effects and Buffs cannot have their Ability Accuracy modified.
Each Unique Buff on the Opponent reduces their Ability Power Rate by 33%. The Power denied is transferred to Spider-Man.
When Spider-Seal is nullified or expires, Mystic Dispersion does not grant Power; instead it deals a Burst of 31.23 Energy Damage for every 1% of Power not gained.
BLESSING OF THE ASTRAL FORM: When the Opponent gains a Spider-Seal, Unblockable or Unstoppable Buff, Spider-Man gains the Blessing of the Astral Form, causing incoming Attacks to Miss for 3 second(s). Spider-Man can Block while this Blessing is active, unless the Opponent has an Unblockable Buff. This effect cannot be refreshed.
Nullifying Spider-Seal Buffs also triggers this Blessing and intercepting the Opponent while this Blessing is active grants 3 Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.
If a Miss is triggered, this effect goes on Cooldown for 20 second(s), minus 3 per Unique Buff on the Opponent to a minimum of 10 second(s). Unblockable Buff attacks ignore this cooldown.
BLESSING OF THE SPIDER-TOTEM: When the Opponent gains a Buff, Spider-Man gains a Totem Charge. At 20 Totems, or half as much as a Defender, he activates the Blessing of the Spider Totem, lasting for 20 second(s) and granting the benefits listed below:
His own First Medium Attacks Nullify Spider-Seal Buffs instead of granting them, dealing a Burst of 144.02 Energy Damage if a Spider-Seal was nullified.
Gain 416.9 Attack Rating, Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70%, but gains 25% of Max Power every 9 second(s).
When the Opponent gains a Buff, they also gain a Spider-Seal Buff and pause this Blessing for 1 second(s). Pause also triggers when nullifying a Spider-Seal.

When Spider-Seal is nullified or expires, Mystic Dispersion does not grant Power; instead it deals a Burst of 86.27 Energy Damage for every 1% of Power not gained.
BLESSING OF THE ASTRAL FORM: When the Opponent gains a Spider-Seal, Unblockable or Unstoppable Buff, Spider-Man gains the Blessing of the Astral Form, causing incoming Attacks to Miss for 3 second(s). Spider-Man can Block while this Blessing is active, unless the Opponent has an Unblockable Buff. This effect cannot be refreshed.
Nullifying Spider-Seal Buffs also triggers this Blessing and intercepting the Opponent while this Blessing is active grants 3 Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.
If a Miss is triggered, this effect goes on Cooldown for 20 second(s), minus 3 per Unique Buff on the Opponent to a minimum of 10 second(s). Unblockable Buff attacks ignore this cooldown.
BLESSING OF THE SPIDER-TOTEM: When the Opponent gains a Buff, Spider-Man gains a Totem Charge. At 20 Totems, or half as much as a Defender, he activates the Blessing of the Spider Totem, lasting for 20 second(s) and granting the benefits listed below:
His own First Medium Attacks Nullify Spider-Seal Buffs instead of granting them, dealing a Burst of 397.86 Energy Damage if a Spider-Seal was nullified.
Gain 1151.7 Attack Rating, Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70%, but gains 25% of Max Power every 9 second(s).
When the Opponent gains a Buff, they also gain a Spider-Seal Buff and pause this Blessing for 1 second(s). Pause also triggers when nullifying a Spider-Seal.
BLESSING OF THE WEB: Heavy Attack grants the Blessing of the Web for 15 second(s). When the Opponent gains Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, Regeneration or Pierce Buffs, Spider-Man gains the same Buff with its listed Potency and duration.
20% Potency Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, and Pierce, and Regeneration, granting 2.2% of Max health. All Buffs last 10 second(s).
As a Defender, gain this Blessing every 15 second(s) unless struck by a Heavy Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit grants 1 Spider-Seal Buff to the Opponent.
Blessing of the Web: Last hit inflicts the Curse of the Web, reducing the Potency of Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Armor Up, Regeneration and Pierce Buffs by 95% for 20 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Last 3 hits deal 785.25 Energy Damage.
Blessing of the Spider Totem: Each hit Nullifies 1 Spider-Seal Buff and deals a burst of 1026.06 Energy Damage per Buff nullified.
Both of these effects go through the Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Root Passive for 4 second(s). Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still Attack, Block and Dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, any contact Power Steals for 2% of the Opponent’s current Power, gains 100% of the Power stolen, and any contact grants Spider-Seal Buffs to the Opponent.
